who.name: Mentor
who.description: Person who taught you your highest occupational skill. Identify the skill and consider who taught you (e.g. a schoolteacher, the person you apprenticed with, your father).

who.name: Friend
who.description: Childhood friend (e.g. classmate, neighbor, imaginary friend).

who.name: Famous Person
who.description: A famous person. Your idol or hero. You may never have even met (e.g. film star, politician, musician).

who.name: Fellow Investigator
who.description: A fellow investigator in your game.

who.name: NPC
who.description: A non-player character (NPC) in the game.

why.name: Indebted
why.description: You are indebted to them. How did they help you? (e.g. financially, they protected you through hard times, got you your first job).

why.name: Teacher
why.description: They taught you something. What? (e.g. a skill, to love, to be a man).

why.name: Meaning
why.description: They give your life meaning. How? (e.g. you aspire to be like them, you seek to be with them, you seek to make them happy).

why.name: Wronged
why.description: You wronged them and seek reconciliation. What did you do? (e.g. stole money from them, informed the police about them, refused to help when they were desperate).

why.name: Shared Experience
why.description: Shared experience. What? (e.g. you lived through hard times together, you grew up together, you served in the war together).

why.name: Prove Yourself
why.description: You seek to prove yourself to them. How? (e.g. by getting a good job, by finding a good spouse, by getting an education).

why.name: Idolize
why.description: You idolize them (e.g. for their fame, their beauty, their work).

why.name: Regret
why.description: A feeling of regret (e.g. you should have died in their place, you fell out over something you said, you didn't step up and help them when you had the chance).

why.name: Better Than
why.description: You wish to prove yourself better than them. What was their flaw? (e.g. lazy, drunk, unloving).

why.name: Revenge
why.description: They have crossed you and you seek revenge. For what do you blame them? (e.g. death of a loved one, your financial ruin, marital breakup).
